node.title: Nijisanji Festival 2022 Confirms LazuLight and Hana Macchia's 3D Debut
node.description: Nijisanji announced on Twitter that the LazuLight trio of Elira Pendora, Pomu Rainpuff and Finana Ryugu as well as Hana Macchia will have their 3D model debuts at the upcoming Nijisanji Festival 2022 this October.
